website_summaries.verdict: Gears 5 is a perfect balance of expert storytelling, terrifying monsters, high-action gameplay, and jaw-dropping visuals, making it an absolute must-play.
pros: Fight off waves of Swarm creatures with friends in Horde mode
Versus mode is better than ever
cons: You’ll want to buy a 4K TV just for Gears 5…

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Present Delayed.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s a fantastic game...except that I didn’t get it on release day like I was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game and graphics! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are amazing. Read Ascendance, good back story. The series is just great and Gears 5 just brings more back home. Campaign is fantastic. Good story and new uses of the robots Dave and Jack. Prepare for more fun and a must have if you are into the Gears franchise. Playability is smooth on Xbox X.
customer_reviews.author: seventhseal

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Played every Gears since the original. This one is not good. Not quite as bad as 3 or judgment. Combat is unexciting. Gnasher only holds 6 rounds now, which is fine (you should be able to get the job done in 6 shots instead of 8 in a gnasher duel), but a bit of a flavor foul for all the story zealots out there. Maybe there’s a sidequest coming later explaining the decrease in capacity; that would probably be more exciting than multiplayer. I played the same 4 maps all day and none of them were close to being as great as a classic clash on Fuel Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Ben R

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy game! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The campaign is plagued with glitches. The AI sucks and often gets in the way instead of helping. The difficulty settings are not very good. The rest of the game is the same as the previous game so just play that if you’re looking for either horde mode or player versus player. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: MrsV

customer_reviews.title: Everybody Was Shotgun Fighting
customer_reviews.text: I've played versus multiplayer for about five hours now and I can't figure out how to play any mode other than the one where everyone uses shotguns all the time. It's getting a little old now.
customer_reviews.author: Grim Godslayer

customer_reviews.title: A polished Gears of War campaign. Pretty much what you expect and not much more.
customer_reviews.text: I only play the Gears series for the campaign. This campaign was what you'd expect from Gears of War. Not spectacular, familiar gameplay, with a few minor additions that make it the best experience so far. About halfway through the campaign I thought to myself, "I could have waited a few months until this game was half price and it would have been fine, but this is fun, so I'm not really upset." Take that sentence, apply it to what you're willing to spend, and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar C. Scaling

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed in sigle player game length
customer_reviews.text: Ive always been a gears fan. Ive played most but not all of Gears. It only took me 48hrs to finish the game in single player mode. Gears 5 is fun but the story ends before killing the queen. I hate when they make these games so short in an attempt to continue the story in future versions(gears 5.5). Gears 5 should be marketed as a online game.
customer_reviews.author: no one

customer_reviews.title: Good luck!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY DISAPPOINTED. The disc wouldn't load. Go online to research why and people are inflamed about all the problems with Gears 5. Tried to uninstall to try reinstalling, locked up my xbox . Had to hard shut down. Three lock ups trying to uninstall this POS. Contacted them and created a ticket...never was contacted. Maybe I'll try again someday. Loved Gears 4. REALLY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: T Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Thank God UPS drop the dog off and not the Amazon drivers
customer_reviews.text: They came by UPS thank God cuz the regular Amazon drivers has been messing up lately on the past couple orders I've gotten stolen I like this video game I'm a fan of the Gears of War series I'm happy I got it today
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. love it love it love it. It reminds me of Gears of War 2. The characters are better, the story is better, the shooting more polished. You feel like you're part of an army fighting in a war, the swarm feels like a threat, it'll hit you in the feels, you can feel like you're among friends, and alot more. It's updated the shooting and the story, the mulitplayer is more or less the same. Also less micro-transactions, more competition and earning rewards. Forgive my incoherence. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Even with new gameplay, the game stays true to its roots.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Cant play campaign because of "Exciting features coming in operation 4"
customer_reviews.text: Despite everything I read on their website about not needing an active internet connection, they are blocking me from playing the OFFLINE STORY CAMPAIGN, or accessing any part of the offline features because their ONLINE MULTIPLAYER SERVERS are under maintenance to prepare for the "exciting" features being added in "operation 4." I don't care if this turns out to be the greatest game I ever play when the servers go back up, it gets a zero because they have my money and think they get to decide when I'm allowed to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Nort Thalem

customer_reviews.title: Too many game mechanics to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: The overall graphics were well done, but I don't like how blocky all the characters are. Everyone must be a powerlifter frame and then layered in more metal. Also, going through the combat tutorials, there are so many possible actions it gets annoying. If you hit these three buttons when you are in this position this move occurs, but hitting these other three does a different move. Oh don't do that move from this position though. Combat just becomes too tedious for me with this being a shooter game.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Mom

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings on this one.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been with Gears since the start. This one while it wasn’t bad and still is a Gears of War game feels different somehow. I can’t quite explain it. Gameplay was good but they tried to bring an open world aspect into a series that really was never known for that. Many areas are just bland. The story on this one picks up from 4 and continues the story in a good way never feels like a full installment. It seemed more like 4.5 and didn’t feel finished when I hit the end.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: So dissppointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing gears of war since the beginning, Probably my favorite video game franchise of all time. The game itself is great however the campaign mode is so full of bugs that my loyalty to this franchise is no more. I do not understand how this game was even released and I hate to say it, but i wont buy another Gears game. 3/4 update Felt the urge to bust some Gears sgain. Still broken in campaign mode 6 months after release! Definitely getting a ps5 instead ofxbox this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary C.

customer_reviews.title: Online play not very good
customer_reviews.text: I love the Gears series. However the online multi-player on Gears 5 is not very good. They changed everything from G4, and not for the better. The single player campaign is good.
customer_reviews.author: your worst nightmare

customer_reviews.title: KEEP GEARS COMING!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it's over too quick, but I just replay it over and over! Super fun and love the story line!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Moore

customer_reviews.title: An above average gears game.
customer_reviews.text: The campaign started off great in Act 1. It was awful for Act 2 and 3. It was good in Act 4. Multiplayer mode was fun for a few months. Gnashers only was limited time and that was a lot of fun. Too many lancers and they are too powerful so it gets boring fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great pickup on sale
customer_reviews.text: Good game, good price ($14.99). Can play local coop split screen or online coop (need two copies or a single digital version using one Xbox as primary and other just logs in). I wouldn't buy this game for full price, but at the sale price I purchased a good pickup. Graphics are really good. Movement a little bit clunky IMO, but the shooting, weapons, and enemys were all solid.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: To woke to relax
customer_reviews.text: I love the graphics but I get enough freaking lectures on race from CNN and regular life, I don’t want r need a woke agenda being pushed on me while I’m trying to relax and play some games to escape normal life’s stresses for just a few mins or a hour..but no even our video games are woke now. Please stop the political indoctrination of video games this has to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tolp

customer_reviews.title: Short game
customer_reviews.text: Great game fun to play, but short. I mean really short. It ends with a lead in for the next game. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Another great game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game!!!! So much to do & even more once U finish campaign. Hordes is awesome! Get to play with other players! Just buy it bc you will love it 👍
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Gray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Dont care what others think or say I love the Gears Games and I will always play them as long as they make them. 4k is amazingly realistic.
customer_reviews.author: SnooP BoB

customer_reviews.title: Lots to do
customer_reviews.text: If you like gears you will be at home, and if this were a game you were going to buy and play for a whole year you have plenty of modes to have fun with
customer_reviews.author: Nick W. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as gears 4
customer_reviews.text: They have messed this franchise up, this game seems crowded, to much stuff going on in one screen. I have a 60 inch TV and the co-op mode seems super small.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Gears 5 rocks
customer_reviews.text: Game is awesome killer graphics, some very difficult spots in this game but wouldn't have it any other way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game!!
customer_reviews.text: Gears never disappoints and G5 continued the tradition of great game play and story line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy Gears fan right now
customer_reviews.text: Omg it's a glitchy mess!! I'm not liking the horde either. I sure hope they fix this, gears is a great game.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia blanton

customer_reviews.title: Pleased one of the gamer in this family
customer_reviews.text: Popul;ar game arrived on time for holidays and at an exceptional price.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Another solid entry in the series.
customer_reviews.text: Gears 5 keeps the core gameplay intact while adding enough new elements to keep the series fresh. The campaign is very entertaining. I love the featured support of Jack. The multiplayer is also fun. If you’re a Gears fan, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: QuietstormRB

customer_reviews.title: Won’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Best gears yet! Can’t put the controller down. Good story line.

customer_reviews.title: Came in already broken
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the game is great however it came in smashed and unplayable...
customer_reviews.author: Fabrizio

customer_reviews.title: Yes !!
customer_reviews.text: Got such a great deal for the game and i thought i would test it out as i liked all the previous games. The game itself is not terrible but it does not live up to the standards of the other games.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Gears 4 was better!
customer_reviews.text: Love Horde mode on Gears 4 and they totally wrecked it with this game!

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the Genre
customer_reviews.text: Available for free with Xbox game pass Good game, worth owning

customer_reviews.title: Love the split screen
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have been playing Gears since the first one, this one doesn't disappoint. We love that it comes with split screen so we can play together on the same TV. We always have a great time.

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best games of 2019
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun. I bought it through Amazon Prime because it was $10 less than most retailers. The game is fun and love the new updates compared to Gears 4. Arrive on time from my Pre-order.

customer_reviews.title: Gears i want your money 5
customer_reviews.text: Multiplayer is a disrespected they barely got any characters every match u get scrap not money WHAT. weekly skins.for 5 dollars they fix the movement of your character. Maps sucks people camping horde mode one character skin or they put another character for you to play arcade mode just got ruin

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: just what i wanted with a better price than stores

customer_reviews.title: Good game, it's Gears, just more of the same...

One other thing I would hope that would have been corrected is you till run into the accidental wall cover more than one would want.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much, boy I was wrong 2 games for the price of 1 Campaign amazing 18 hours long. Multiplayer plenty of gore, matches and consistently updated.

If your mainly playing the campaign you should get it. If you want to play the multiplayer its definetly not worth it.

customer_reviews.text: I am a big Gears Of War fan and love this game. The story line is fun to play and the team play is fun to. Great game.

customer_reviews.text: Very addicting multiplayer. Purchased it bc my wife and I can play split screen at home. We can play with bots bc we won’t go play against a bunch of young people in PvP. They would destroy us. Fun level up and reward system which keeps making you grind away, especially now with the quarantine.

product_meta.title: Gears 5 - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:StandardFrom one of gaming’s most acclaimed sagas, Gears is bigger than ever, with five thrilling modes and the deepest campaign yet. With all out war descending, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself
feature_bullets: From one of the most acclaimed game franchises in history, Gears 5 delivers an epic campaign and brutal action across five thrilling modes
Campaign: With all out war descending, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera herself
Escape: A new, aggressive, high stakes co op mode featuring a three player suicide squad that must work together to take out enemy hives from within
Versus: May the best team win with 10+ other game types plus new and classic maps. Versus rewards every competitive style, from casual to pro
Horde: Endure 50 waves of ever tougher enemies using new hero abilities, building defenses, collecting power, leveling up your skills and working as a team
Map Builder: Create custom escape hive maps and experiences to share with and challenge your friends

Customize your gaming experience with updated accessibility features, including: Full controller remapping, single stick movement, Adaptive controller support, narrated UI and menus, improved subtitles and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,838 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
